channel.title: Auto Racing on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Auto Racing on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How They Make the Mario Kart-Style 'Ghost Car' for Auto Racing Broadcasts
item.description: Watch a Formula 1, Nascar, or IndyCar race and you’ll see a “ghost car” overlayed atop the real-life image. The sensors used to create it also collect heaps of data that teams can access and study.
